mapper.select: /*AdminMng_SQL.selectUniqueDupliChk*/ SELECT COMM_ID , COMM_P_ID , COMM_GROUP_CD , COMM_NM , COMM_USE_YN , COMM_CN , COMM_SORT_NO , COMM_CD , COMM_LVL , COMM_DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM TB_COMMON_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND COMM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_LVL = 0 ORDER BY COMM_SORT_NO
